OCR_info.question_text: 다음 중 나눗셈에서 몫의 위치가 바르게 된 것은 어느 것입니까? $ ① \begin{array}{r} 2~0~~~\phantom{)} \\ 2{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,~~~4~0\phantom{)}}}\\ \end{array} $  $ ② \begin{array}{r} 2~0\phantom{)} \\ 2{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,4~0\phantom{)}}}\\ \end{array} $ $ ③ \begin{array}{r} ~~~2~0\phantom{)} \\ 2{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,4~0~~~\phantom{)}}}\\ \end{array} $ $ ④ \begin{array}{r} 2\phantom{)} \\ 2{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,4~0\phantom{)}}}\\ \end{array} $ $ ⑤ \begin{array}{r} 2~~~\phantom{)} \\ 2{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,4~0\phantom{)}}}\\ \end{array} $
